channel.title: Compliing help!
channel.description:
look if u got java update 3 put this in ur enirmont varabiles first open up ur enviroment variabales then do this
"PATH" put this
[code]C:\Program Files\PHP\;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\bin\;C:\Program Files\QuickTime\QTSystem\;[/code]
classpath put this in order to have classpath click new and and make it class path [code].;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\bin\;C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\lib\ext\QTJava.zip [/code] complier put this
[code]Code: @echo off COLOR 09 title PhoneScape Source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java" server pause [/code]

item.title: Compliing help!
item.dc:creator: @murphy0lee murphy0lee
item.description:
@murphy0lee wrote:

look if u got java update 3 put this in ur enirmont varabiles
first open up ur enviroment variabales then do this

“PATH” put this

C:\Program Files\PHP\;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\bin\;C:\Program Files\QuickTime\QTSystem\;

classpath put this in order to have classpath click new and and make it class path

.;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\bin\;C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\lib\ext\QTJava.zip
complier put this

Code: @echo off COLOR 09 title PhoneScape Source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java" server pause

Read full topic
